# arrangedObjects

**Instance Property**

An array containing the receiver’s content objects arranged using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSArrayController/arrange(_:)].

## Declaration

```swift
var arrangedObjects: Any { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is observable using key-value observing.

## Arranging Objects

- **arrange(_:)**: Returns a given array, appropriately sorted and filtered.
- **rearrangeObjects()**: Triggers filtering of the receiver’s content.
